item.title: Translate Squarespace, Eamon design
item.dc:creator: @Marcelo_Luz Marcelo Luz
item.description:
@Marcelo_Luz wrote:

Hi, I followed some tutorials but I'm not expert in programming, and
need to know to make the code to install the translation on my site, I
need:

And with this function, solution:
https://www.bradgood.net/articles/multi-language-content-on-any-squarespace-template

"Bonus Step.

If you want to take this one step further, Then you can detect you the
user is on the About page, Then clicks on the "Español" link in the
header, this will take you to the "About" page, rather than the homepage. "

But with this button design: http://beyond-kyoto.com/en/

Translation is English to Portuguese, have separate pages already are 3
pages equal with separate languages:

Page names:

en/about, en/work, en/contact
pt/sobre, pt/trabalho, pt/contato

What price? Payment with international card?

Thank you very much

Marcelo Mantovani da Luz

Este email foi escaneado pelo Avast antivírus.
https://www.avast.com/antivirus

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: Translate Squarespace, Eamon design

item.title: Squarespace modification stopped working

item.description:
@jessica wrote:

Hi Caue

Hope you are well.

You did a small Squarespace modification for me about a year ago. It was adding thumbnails to the blog page on my website: http://www.formulate.com.au/blog/.

I’ve just posted another blog entry (“Is inline validation out?”) and the thumbnail is not showing. Can you help me work out what’s wrong?

Many thanks,

Jessica Enders

item.title: Squarespace Help! Custom Gallery. Available to hire?
item.dc:creator: @bhupp3 Bob
item.description:
@bhupp3 wrote:

Hello,

My wife and I running a wedding videography company and are in the process of building our website on Squarespace and we've ran into a little snag. We would like to have a gallery to display our videos, which are hosted on Vimeo, but don't like the options for video galleries that they offer. What I would like to do is start with a blank page and add photos our our couples to it so that we can size them and arrange them however we would like, instead of sticking to the confines of the gallery. I've attached an image to give you and idea of what I am thinking. When a picture is clicked on, I would like the corresponding video to open up in a lightbox covering most of the screen. I've tried to accomplish this using some of the code you have out there for doing the same idea with buttons, but haven't been able to get it to work properly.

Are you available to hire to come up with a solution, or if you already have one would you mind leading me in the right direction?

Thanks in advance!

website example.jpg1252x871 71.1 KB

Posts: 6

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: Squarespace Help! Custom Gallery. Available to hire?

item.title: I pay you $30 for a link in http://cregox.com/t/cnai-2w-the-bitcoin-future-is-determined-2016-feb-05/7841
item.dc:creator: @John_Flex John Flex
item.description:
@John_Flex wrote:

Hi, i would like to know if is possible to pay you $30 so you can add a link to a bitcoin site from the following page:

[CNAi 2w] the bitcoin future is determined! (2016 feb 05) tech
CNAi 2w stands for "codenewbie artificial intelligence biweekly", but that might change soon... when I join in around minute 11 everything slows down for a while, I was already sleepy and trying to figure out why it was so slow, and it was obviously thanks to my terrible non-fiber 0.5 mbps upstream internet here at historical lisbon center. I promise the broadcast gets better later on, if you enjoy artificial intelligence, science and / or philosophy. topics touched: autonomous cars and…

Can i send you sample of the text link that i want to add?

Thank you for your time.

Participants: 2

item.title: Need two play buttons on squarespace cover image
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Mike Lanza:

Hello Caue,

For the Squarespace web site for a new iOS app I'm launching, my design has
a cover photo on the home page with two play buttons for videos - one on
the left and one on the right. The video triggered by the play button on
the left can be full screen, letter boxed. The video triggered by the play
button on the right is in the shape of an iPhone in portrait mode - i.e.
vertical orientation.

My reason for having these two play buttons is that I have two videos that
communicate two different, parallel marketing messages about the app, like
Lite Beer from Miller Lite's old "Tastes Great, Less Filling" ad campaign.
( http://buildingpharmabrands.com/2013/04/26/great-taste-less-filling/ )

Can you help me with this?

Once I solve this problem, I'll still need to build the rest of that page,
another page, and two forms pages. I'll probably ask help from someone -
you or someone else.

Thanks in advance.

- Mike Lanza

(Sent via cregox http://www.cregox.com )

(post can't be empty discourse bug)

Posts: 5

Participants: 3

Read full topic
item.source: Need two play buttons on squarespace cover image

Could you provide some script for me? obviously, I am happy to pay for your
time.

Here is the gallery i am dealing with :
http://www.melanieandroberto.com/test

item.title: Daniel Cabral's architect portfolio squarespace issues
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Daniel Cabral:

Subject: Help with multiple issues on a Squarespace project

Message: First, a little context: the website is the portfolio for an
architect. It starts with a cover page that links to the portuguese and the
english version of the website. The english version is actually a second
squarespace project, identical to the first and pointing to a subdomain.

The issues I need to fix are the following:

COVER PAGE

- Logo on cover page is not centrally aligned on mobile. It is always a
little to the right, and depending on the screen size, a lot to the right.

SITE IN PORTUGUESE

- The site is not loading properly on mobile (smartphones or ipads). The
layout is rendered too different from what the template is supposed to look
like (http://flatiron-demo.squarespace.com/).

- on the page “projetos”, the name of each project is not showing up on top
of the picture, as it should do.

- On a project’s page, images should occupy the whole screen, but are
actually rather small and aligned to the right. In some smartphones, the
images simply don’t load.

SITE IN ENGLISH

- For some reason, it seems like on mobile devices, the website is not
loading the same visual template as the portuguese site.

- On a project’s page, images should occupy the whole screen, but are
actually rather small and aligned to the right. In some smartphones, the
images simply don’t load.

- The website is supposed to appear under the subdomain
“english.semerene.com”, but it is not working very well. If I click in any
link, even for another website, it keeps showing on the URL address the
same “english.semerene.com”. Try clicking on the logo, for example. It
leads you to the same page hosted on “semerene.com”, but the address bar
shows “english.semerene.com”.

INSTAGRAM BLOCK

- On page “diario visual” or “visual journal”: for some reason, there is a
“hole” on the grid of instagram images.

"post can't be empty" due to discourse bug. message to be removed

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: Daniel Cabral's architect portfolio squarespace issues

item.title: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi!

I found your tutorial http://www.cregox.com/full-video/ and I've been
trying to figure out how to DIY the codes into my squarespace site.

I've been doing my best in following your instructions but I still couldn't
get it to work. It would be extremely helpful if you could point me in the
right direction and tell me what I'm doing wrong.

Here's a screenshot of my page so far. I'm using a sample video from Vimeo
as the video I want to use is not done yet.


​

I'm trying to place a button on the homepage that plays a full screen video
in a lightbox. As you can see, I've already done the following:

1. Added a gallery block (set to Grid and open in lightbox)
2. Added a button above the gallery block (Add the jquery code into it)
3. Added a code block below the video and pasted the long code that you
provided

I can't figure out what I'm doing wrong and I hope you can help me out.

Your help would be greatly appreciated!

Yours sincerely,

Zulhilmy

From Singapore

Posts: 4

Participants: 3

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with Squarespace Full BG video

item.title: Squarespace and font types on titles
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi Caue,

You helped me out awhile ago withe my squarespace site www.becflores.com. I
set up my type so it displays as Maison Neue Book. I am having an issue
where the page titles on the homepage and the text on the individual
project pages is defaulting to a serif typeface. Can you please help me.
Let me know what the cost will be?

It seems it's just the h2 style that has defaulted, the rest of the type is
displaying correctly.

Thanks
Bec

item.title: Square Space List of Items to Implement
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi -

We are using SquareSpace for our mobile site (Momentum Template). We have a few custom tweaks we want to make for the page and would like a quote to implement the following items:

-Reduce the space between lines for single items in the mobile menu.

-Compress folders in the mobile menu (plus to expand)

-Move the Nav bar to the bottom of the screen for mobile site only

-Loop gallery (have arrow on last image to loop to the beginning of the gallery)

-Use + sign instead of info sign (i in circle)

-Remove header/header space on pages

-Keep gallery view background opaque with menus still transparent.

Please let me know if these items are possible as well as a quote for how long it would take.

Thank you,

Meghann

Posts: 3

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: Square Space List of Items to Implement

item.title: Squarespace website coding - auto play video, drop shadows, parallax, etc
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hello,

I found you through squarespace specialists. I just made a new site for my
company and am not as web savvy as I'd like and need css coding or coding
in general and there are a few things I would like to have done and wanted
to get a quote.

Here is my website: www.helloairbot.com

I am using the template horizon and I am hosting my videos through wistia.
I need code done to get my cover video to auto play upon page load. It's
currently in a gallery and you have to press the play button. It will
auto play with a code block but I need code for the block to stretch like
the video currently looks in the gallery. My old site I was using the
shift template for the parallaxing pages but I wanted the one page scroller
so horizon seemed to be the perfect fit.

So what I need is custom code to make my cover video auto play in the code
block size I need. I would like to get a couple of my pages to parallax
and I want some drop shadow on some of my pictures/pages as well. I would
also like to get the hover overlays with the titles of my videos like the
site below as well.
----------->www.motionstate.com is a site that has the parallaxing and drop
shadow, and graphic hover elements I want.

If you could give me a quote on how much you would charge to make these
changes to my site happen I would greatly appreciate it.

Thanks so much!

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic
item.source: Squarespace website coding - auto play video, drop shadows, parallax, etc
